sentences.en: A plume of smoke rose from the chimney.
sentences.cn: 从烟囱里冒出一缕轻烟.

sentences.en: A shower of sparks flew up the chimney.
A thin twist of smoke curled from the cottage's single chimney.
sentences.cn: 一缕盘旋的轻烟从农舍唯一的烟囱里缭绕升起。

sentences.en: A wisp of smoke is curling up from a chimney.
He believes Santa Claus comes in through the chimney.
sentences.cn: 他相信圣诞老人从烟囱进来.

sentences.en: He threw the paper onto the fire and it flew up the chimney.
sentences.cn: 他把那张纸扔进火里，纸飘进了烟道。

sentences.en: I roped myself to the chimney.
sentences.cn: 我用绳子把自己系在烟囱上。

sentences.en: Put a chimney on the stove to make the fire draw.
Smoke was curling up the chimney.
The chimney blew out a cloud of black smoke.
The chimney pots are purely ornamental.
sentences.cn: 这些烟囱管帽纯属装饰。

sentences.en: The chimney was pouring out black smoke.
The factory has been emitting black smoke from its chimney.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂的烟囱一直冒黑烟.

sentences.en: The inside of a chimney soon gets covered in soot.
sentences.cn: 烟囱里面很快就覆盖了一层煤烟.

sentences.en: We can’t light a fire because the chimney hasn’t been swept.
sentences.cn: 烟囱管没有清扫过，我们生不了火。

phrases.tran_cn: 总合烟囱，仅一通道之烟囱

trans.tran_en: a vertical pipe that allows smoke from a fire to pass out of a building up into the air, or the part of this pipe that is above the roof
